description:
Kasumi, Phantom 305, is now a retired thief and college student, but her family is forcing her to marry a cad.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ryo is the Love Thief! Hidden Love Affair Behind the Magic Mirror (Part 1)
Ryou wa Koidorobou! Makyou ni Himeta Ai no Yukue (Zenpen)
獠は恋泥棒! 魔鏡に秘めた愛の行方 (前編)
